website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-QX10 might be a fresh take on a point-and-shoot camera, but the design ends up being a bit more trouble than it's worth.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot QX10 at its core is a good point-and-shoot camera with photo quality that's better than you'd get with most smartphones
Connects easily with Android devices with NFC
Available platform-agnostic API allows app developers to add support
cons: The camera has a very limited feature set compared with a regular point-and-shoot
Sony's mobile app has few features
extended shooting drains your smartphone's battery
and its shooting performance can be extremely frustrating

website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-QX10 is an add-on lens for use with smartphones. It's an example of a risky, forward-thinking concept, but some issues prevent us from recommending it.
cons: Image noise at moderate ISO settings
Shutter lag when triggering from phone
Takes time to mount to phone
Slow startup compared to a standalone camera

customer_reviews.title: Take DSLR quality photos without lugging an extra camera
customer_reviews.text: Good for when you want more than just quick snapshots. It takes a few seconds to start up and sync with your phone, so it works best when you are intending to take photos. The smaller lens (this one) is perfect for wide shots and vistas. Photos save both on your phone and to a micro sd card. The images on the card are much larger files, so you can really blow them up. YOU DO NOT NEED WIFI TO USE THIS! It communicates with your phone on its own network, so you can be in the middle of nowhere, and it'll still work. Works best in fair-strong lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: camalaki

customer_reviews.title: the image quality is not as good as iphone 6 camera
customer_reviews.text: the image quality is not as good as iphone 6 camera. No able to control zoom via app. Might be good aid to take selfie......overall, might be a good one 2 yrs ago, but not right now. Also, although stated as "as new", there's clearly cosmetic issue (such as scratchs)
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Useful in special moments
customer_reviews.text: It has a great dynamic range, more than my smartphone, the zoom is useful, but the time for take a picture with it, is long. You must turn on, unlock your cellphone, open the application, wait to the connection were succesfully, focus and shoot, is not recomended for instant moments, is easiest just with your phone. I dont know how to delete the pictures in to the sd, is not possible to format it, be sure your sd card is empty before a travel, after that is not possible delete photos. The life battery is short, be sure to turn off when not are taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment in terms of accessibility.
customer_reviews.text: I found a used QX10 for like 1/3 the selling price. I enjoy it very much. The photo quality is great. It's a bit clunky at times in terms of WiFi and nfc (well at least for me). Trying to streamline the operation so I can shoot quicker. Over all I like it for getting far shots (zoom) Next I will try it with a tripod at night!! 🤔
customer_reviews.author: ME PHI ME

customer_reviews.title: ... Sony Xperia Z3 Compact phone which already has an amazing camera, 20
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sony Xperia Z3 Compact phone which already has an amazing camera, 20.7MP, but the QX10 trumps in picture quality. It fits on the phone perfectly, and I always get lots of compliments on the photos. Highly recommend. BTW, make sure your update your firmware on the camera. There have been lots of bug fixes, especially with the video. Mine came with firmware ver 1.0 and I think it updated to 3.0. Easy to do, just Google it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney SBTop Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: I like to have camera (nicer than the one on my iphone) with me on my backpacking trips and got tired of lugging around my Samsung NX1000. This is the perfect solution. I already have my phone for maps and such and this camera is very lightweight and easily packable. It is also nice for group pics to mount it and see our picture and fire from the phone instead of running back and forth. I have always been a fan of the Sony picture quality and while I normally opt for the Carl Zeiss lens I went with the Sony version this time due to expense and it is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: jfam5128

customer_reviews.title: Nice as far as it goes
customer_reviews.text: I believe Sony stopped short of making a great accessory for smart phones and tablets. My biggest complaint is that they provide an 18MP sensor and then dumb it down to 5MP compressed jpg. Let the user decide how big the image should be. I like the fact that I can aim the lens independent from the phone. It's easier to carry this in my pocket to increase the capability of my phone camera than to carry a second full camera. Learn to use it for what it does and know when to switch cameras. I like it for what it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best carry around camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge list of cameras that I own or have owned in the past, if I had to give a favorite for carrying around and keeping things light this camera wins. It is light, small and takes great pictures. It takes up little room in my backpack or wife's purse, connects in just a couple seconds to the phone and gives you a freedom to take some interesting pictures. At home I love it for getting pictures of my cats, I can get the camera low or in spot a typical point and shoot would have difficulty with and get a perfect shot every time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to give this 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is a lot of fun to use and the pictures are excellent. The reason I am giving it four instead of five stars is because the camera is prone to freezing. So every so often right in the middle of shooting it will freeze and you have to turn it off, close the app, and start again. This can take a few minutes of your time to do. My other complaint is that in program mode you don't have enough control. I realize that this is really just a point-and-shoot, but at least a little more control would go a long way. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Pharaoh M. Lamothe

customer_reviews.title: Great for using in cojuntion with OLD smart phone
customer_reviews.text: I return this product. I thought to get the QX 100. And I bought the sony dsc-rx100va. It is a good idea but I have seen better pictures on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Pazos

customer_reviews.title: So don't expect wonderful video from this
customer_reviews.text: Photos are ok with this, but connecting takes forever. You can't set the camera and then use it without the phone. You must be connectd to a phone. Drains the phone battery fairly quickly. Video is choppy and has a lot of missing frames. So don't expect wonderful video from this... No lighting or any way of adding lighting (no hotshoe) it's a very limited camera and is entirely too slow for use in candid shots.
customer_reviews.author: kathryne

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product when your cell phone camera just isn't enough but you just don't feel like carrying your camera bag. True there is no flash but most photographers find that they don't use the flash enough for it to be a deal breaker. And you could always splash out on the QX-100 and get a faster lens. I especially like that I ordered a used one from amazon and it works perfectly and I never did see the imperfection that they listed (????). Saved a little money and got a perfectly functioning product...thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine331

customer_reviews.title: The instructions come in Japanese so you'll need to find ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions come in Japanese so you'll need to find the English version. The zoom isn't nearly what I was hoping for and there does seem to be some lag. I'll play with it for a day or two but might end up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: Handy compact and versatile camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flexibility and innovative nature of this lens/camera. The only thing that would make it a 5 star would be the option for the Android app having the ability to utilize the flash/light on the phone. Also, screen view latency on the phone takes some getting used to. Over all, very cool accessory and pretty decent camera capture. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: 1min wait between picture taking makes it not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: There's really no great reason for this product. Itried returning it but return slip never came and now I'm stuck with it collecting dust. It take 1min to take another shot which is super annoying and the quality isn't better than my smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Tivy E Sinclair Jr.

customer_reviews.title: nice but slow
customer_reviews.text: Takes a great picture as long as you are shooting stills. Lag time for preview is very annoying but ok for slow still shots. I use it to take pictures of artwork. Easier then pulling out the big camera and the pictures are great. I messed with the video a bit and it seems very clear and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: Have only experimented with it a few times....it does work, but seems very laggy, and slow to keep up.....must find a way to set the shutter speed (if possible) as most all the shots are blurred with any motion at all.
customer_reviews.author: Allen R. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Excllent product that worked well for me..
customer_reviews.text: Love the small form factor and, "better than smartphone" pictures this little thing takes. For me, the key to not missing shots was to know your situation and leave both the camera, and app, running. Also, having extra batteries in reserve helps. The second you turn off the camera, or close the app, you drop your pairing and your left to reinitialize. This aspect alone has led to frustration in other owners. For my style of picture taking (substance over quantity) the positives outweigh the negatives so I'm likely to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus D. Pizana

customer_reviews.title: Wifi issues
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way this camera looked but sadly I have not used it often enough to make my purchase worth it. The problem is that you're going to have to go around with a larger piece of hardware. There are issues with the wifi connection, the device takes a while to connect and when it does, you obviously can't use another wifi hotspot to download data. It looks really fancy, the white version at least, but it's best to wait that the cameras on phones improve before attaching this kind of piece on it.
customer_reviews.author: ibrandl

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my business when I take photos of my listings
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory to my iPhone with wonderful quality results and impressive zoom but a little quirky. For instance you can't use the iphone flash and you need a SD card to take videos. Nevertheless I'm pleased I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: SrqBrit

customer_reviews.title: Neat camera
customer_reviews.text: The wi-fi connection has to be set up too often. It would be a better device if it were connected by bluetooth. I do like the ability to remotely control it from my iPhone. The 10 to 1 zoom is a great feature for an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Barker

customer_reviews.title: What this camera can do in this fascinating format is great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to give it only a 4 because I'm giving it's big brother only a 4.5, and that's only because nothing is perfect. These are terrific cameras. The pictures are great. You'll always hear complaints but, be honest, neither of us is a pro, and what this camera can do in this fascinating format is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jean McCluskey

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera and the fact that you can take pictures with it remotely via your phone allows for a lot of new ways of taking pictures. The only downside I see, is the fact that it has no flash. It really hampers the camera in poorly lit conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Khanikun

customer_reviews.title: Cool addition
customer_reviews.text: This lens works with my Samsung Galaxy S2 with the standard battery pack, but doesn't clamp with bulkier extended-life battery pack or with Nexus 7 tablet. Lens works fine on tripod or held in hand. As expected, much sharper pictures than standard phone camera and 10X zoom opens a much larger range of picture potentials.
customer_reviews.author: Don G Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Oh Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! Of corse my iPhone is my #1 everyday camera, but when I want to do some quality shooting or remote shooting i reach for this! It's like bringing a cannon to a knife fight, it's just totally unfair and Fun!
customer_reviews.author: cpro

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great for your cell phone or tablet. Be warned though that the image isn't much better than shooting with your Samsung 4 camera built in the phone. If you have an older version cell phone, this is def an upgrade
customer_reviews.author: GGmomx2

customer_reviews.title: Cool Camera
customer_reviews.text: Innovative camera from Sony. Wirelessly uses my iPhone as the viewfinder and saves the picture on the phone. Small size and easy attachment allows it to be with me when I need it. Good quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: buyerpr

customer_reviews.title: Great little piece of technology and it perfectly matches my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little piece of technology and it perfectly matches my white Z3C. It zooms very well (optical zoom) making up for the one major problem I had with my phone camera.
customer_reviews.author: shethsa

customer_reviews.title: better use the one from your smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Incredible camera, it is a little slow for connecting, for fast photos, better use the one from your smartphone, but if you have the time, it really lets you take some great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony SmartPhone WiFi Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive of buying a used item. The Item I received was in perfect working order and was able to put it to work right away. The actual item may have its limitations like no Macro capabilities but that's a Sony issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, needs better execution
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to connect and keep connected, slow shutter, focus not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: dfra_sf

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth the
customer_reviews.text: This lens does really well with an iPhone, very sleek not cheaply made at all. Great product worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Wifi makes it too slow for any action photo
customer_reviews.text: The lens us fine. But I connect through wifi to my iPhone. The connection is so slow it makes it difficult to use for anything other than still life pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but implementation is not good
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but implementation is not good. The app that connected with the camera does not give you a lot of room to place around with. The photos are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bibek Pachhai

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is fantastic, and the optical zoom is very nice to ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fantastic, and the optical zoom is very nice to have (as opposed to just cropping/digital zoom). Takes some tries to get it connected reliably and quickly, though.
customer_reviews.author: Corbyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Cool lens. Execution needs a bit more work.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this camera. I think the execution needs to be worked on a little more. The pictures were good quality and when the camera and app were up and running it was pretty cool. I eventually returned. There is no flash, and it needs a way to boot up quickly for quick pictures. I think it's really cool that you can seperate the camera lens from the viewer (your phone) and take unique angles and locations. I hope they stick with this concept, because it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: GhostriderZ

customer_reviews.title: sony good idea
customer_reviews.text: well this camera connects with my iphone and gives 18 mb pics fantastic very practical very nice and sharp very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: benigo t toda III

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool concept, but image quality isn't much better than ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool concept, but image quality isn't much better than just a camera phone. The next model up is supposed to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little device even works when your smartphone dies
customer_reviews.text: Camera fits in your pocket. Can record 1080p video and zoom upto 10x. Perfect little device even works when your smartphone dies.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyin

customer_reviews.title: O.K. but Sony DSC-HX50Z with FDA-EV1M is much better.
customer_reviews.text: Not as convenient to use as I expected it to be. I prefer my Sony DSC-HX50Z with FDA-EV1M. It's not really not that much bigger to carry in a jacket pocket. The picture quality is much higher and the 50x zoom much handier..
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how much fun i have had with this! Get it! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ll.pics

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea, but the limited WiFi distance makes it useless for a lot of applications.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: okay camera to play with
customer_reviews.text: PRO: The lens is light and compact. Easy to carry for travel. Image is sharp under low light condition. CON: Sony iphone app has a horrible response lag time, make it hard to use for many occations.
customer_reviews.author: W Z

customer_reviews.title: Wish the video playback was better. When taking a video it is choppy on ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish the video playback was better. When taking a video it is choppy on my S7. turned off Bluetooth as recommend . still no change. Works great for taking remote photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dantheman1

customer_reviews.title: Return item.
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality lens, leggy and slow didn't work well with my Galaxy S3. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Yury

customer_reviews.title: Slow piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. The line between my galaxy note 3 in this camera was horrible didn't last a day
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Romance

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: ****Update-now working fine with IOS 7.. Seems to work as advertised... Reasonable image quality (low light not great but OK). IOS 7 platforms are DOA for now..
customer_reviews.author: M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: but what a Terrific Toy. iPhone 6 camera is better at most ...
customer_reviews.text: its really just a Toy...but what a Terrific Toy. iPhone 6 camera is better at most normal photos but telephoto lens sometimes comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hundley

customer_reviews.title: Work great on sgs3 WITH extend battery buy ZeroLemon ( yeah ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great on sgs3 WITH extend battery buy ZeroLemon ( yeah the super big one) Still would be a little worried so watch out. Work flawless with NFC (But still need a built in Wifi) .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew webb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get way to get shows where a phone or tablet can't reach.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Connection can be a little finicky sometimes. There can be a lag from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: CLG

customer_reviews.title: All OK
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Small and useful. I like its appearance. I don't know if it will be durable, but it seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: BOLIVAR CONDOR S.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Pictures turn out great but from the time you turn it on and the app on your phone and it has to connect to the Wi-Fi, it can be a bit of a wait. I have missed some shots. Took it to a concert and the video did turned out great and the photos came out very good. Just don't like the lag time. But it is compact and I like that after you take the shot, it will store it to your phone so you can text the photo right away.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but not usable as much as it used to since the phone camera improved ..
customer_reviews.author: Ophir Sweiry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Can take photo from a weird angle which suppose u cannot reach
customer_reviews.author: T. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Unique Cam for special shots
customer_reviews.text: Great Seller, good product, but not fully ready for prime time. Extremely handy, and will continue to get better as SONY continues to develop the APPs. Handicapped by no flash interface, but invaluable for other applications: can be inconspicuously mounted for HD recording or pictures (weddings, recitals, multi-cam interviews, candid children), and the improvement in quality over other options makes it worth it (just don't try to make it do everything).
customer_reviews.author: Art my middle name

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to the cellphone camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic. It takes a little getting used to with the new software. but it pairs easily with my (droid razr) phone and daughters iphone. Very versatile. Small enough to take with you everywhere without dragging out a larger camera to get those great shots. The only downside is there is a little lag between the picture taking and the loading to the phone depending on the wifi, but not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Good quality pictures -Good focus Cons: -The wireless connection lags...a lot. sometimes the picture freezes on my display so I have to wait for it to change to what it's actually looking at before i can shoot. The good focus may help when you can't see but think you have what you want in your shot, but again you can see whats in fram or not sometimes because of the lag.
customer_reviews.author: It'sJustFranklin

customer_reviews.title: Just I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Nice combination with iPhone. We can take pictures with mechanical zoom or stand off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product also a fantastic delivery time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The lens replaced my carry-on camera , and it's more convenient than the regular camera. I would suggest that sony improve the sony memories app.
customer_reviews.author: hassan qassab

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on the iPhone and the performance is very good. The photos are noticeably better than with the iPhone camera, especially in zoom mode
customer_reviews.author: Steven Argosy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget,,, it turned my Note 3 into a world class phone
customer_reviews.author: NATE G

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and concept
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as it was described, but I was expecting more from Sony. Kudos to Sony for the invention, but I think they should go back to the drawing board. I love the design and concept, but the internals and app need a lot of work! Seems under-baked. The item has great potential and I would have loved to actually keep it, but it certainly is not worth more than $125 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ehlien

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: quite convenient!but it doesn't have the flashlight. So shot in the dark isn't good enough. Basically, I love it, small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Wang

customer_reviews.title: Sony doesn't leverage what I already have
customer_reviews.text: This product could have been designed to leverage all of the things my smartphone has to offer (but it doesn't). It doesn't leverage: -my camera app (have to use sony's) -my phone memory (videos need a memory card) -my quad core processor (sony's app freezes and studders frequently) I love the idea of an external device that simply gives me the optical zoom and image stabilization that most smartphones lack. I hope Sony can cleanup these problems, because they will have a killer smartphone peripheral. I use this product with an android based HTC One.
customer_reviews.author: carRAMR0D

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality wasn't as great as I thought that it would be
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality wasn't as great as I thought that it would be. Plus clipping it on my phone was a hassle so I just held it most the time. Now it's just collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Gernell L Henderson

customer_reviews.title: perfect with iPad!!! Wonderful...but would have been nice if the tiny window is for photo viewing instead of battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Additional Review: note: this work as well without the wifi...just open with DSC-Qx10 then your Sony Android, IPhone, Samsung...then you're good to go...take awesome shot.
customer_reviews.author: Dori J.

customer_reviews.title: Diamond in the rough
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea. NFC probably works better, iPhones do not have NFC. It's small but not that small; you would still "carry" a second device, so it might as well be a complete camera which connects wirelessly to your phone. I couldn't wait for the other apps that would use this, and PlayMemories is so lacking. I will wait for a smaller version, that connects faster (iBeacon?), and is recognized by more apps. I really, really wanted it to work for me! It has so much potential. But I can't justify $250 on an experiment. So after a week, I am returning it, with a heavy heart :(
customer_reviews.author: Rick Deckard

customer_reviews.title: Just a basic point and shoot. Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice camera for point and shoot but I wish I had done more homework. I thought this had more manual settings like P, A S M but it's just a point and shoot. Will sell as soon as I can afford the difference to get the QX100
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT accessory!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five was because of two very important issues. Without an additional sd card for the lens, it wouldn't connect with my husband's S4. This was extremely frustrating since it was not written anywhere in the tiny handbook. It took us over a day and a half of trying everything until we casually came upon that solution. Secondly, having to connect it to the cell phone every time we wished to take a picture. Otherwise, it is a great accessory!!
customer_reviews.author: ANAE

customer_reviews.title: need more improvement.
customer_reviews.text: setting up this lens every single time i use it made me miss the action shots. it's simple took too long!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Bad software. Lags, not user friendly. Lacks even basic simple features. Good hardware.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is good but the software is really bad. Sony is really lazy for not complementing good software with this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swandono

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is far too difficult for anyone but the most technical savvy person to use easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Quirky lens interesting concept poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Quirky camera. Takes a while to connect to your phone and then some more to the app. So you can miss shots as this process takes 10secs. Also it is front heavy when mounted on the iPhone. But you can handhold this and take unusual shots. Interesting concept but poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Vkalya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent idea but not good for iOS
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this product, unfortunately is not yet functional with iOS. It takes too long to connect and then to transfer the photo, basically you miss the picture moment specially with photographing children.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Civetta

customer_reviews.title: Sony needs to improve app to fix slow sync with phone
customer_reviews.text: I just got a Sony QX10 for my daughter for her birthday. She was very exciting to have this gift as she loves to take pictures. But she was bit disappointed as app provided by Sony is lousy. First the sync is very slow between the phone for each picture taken. Then the iPhone app freezes frequent with the lens connected. With these kind of problems, sometimes it's almost impossible to use the lens since you have to keep resetting the app. This lens is a great concept but with many software bugs. I hope Sony would update the iOS app soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kwong

customer_reviews.title: doesn't like expected and the resolution is not good
customer_reviews.text: cámara is too slow... doesn't like expected and the resolution is not good.... how can y do to return this ítem?
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Horrible camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera quality seemed rather poor for a 18MP camera, the focusing ability was quite bad, and the wifi connection to my smartphone was buggy, slow, and aggravating. I hated this camera, and am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Shen

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was really made for the Android. I use it on my iPhone a little more trouble but takes nice photos especially low light.
customer_reviews.author: Hansen Visual Productions

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a lot more from it, more control over it like a real camera, but is nice, Is pretty cool and comfortable to use, specially if you are traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Complete five star review. Works great and it was a wonderful gift
customer_reviews.author: Berenice i lopez

customer_reviews.title: It is versatile and useful, for remote controlled camera action
customer_reviews.text: It is versatile and useful, for remote controlled camera action, e.g. taking photos of small animals or birds. Battery life is reasonably long and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel C Leung

customer_reviews.title: A good start
customer_reviews.text: This lens takes pretty good pictures - a big improvement over standard iPhone functionality. The biggest challenge was the regular disconnect of the lens wireless from the phone, so there can be a lot of missed shots while you go into settings and re-establish the connection. Not quite right for the aspiring photographer or someone needing to quickly get prepared for a shot, but it's good for general sightseeing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Hefty price
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is a five star product, except for the price, seems a little high, so the reason for the 4 star. I like the versitility, being able to set the unit away from the viewing screen, in this case an iphone 5, besides, i just like buying things that operate from the phone. Its pretty much just a point and shot, which is ok with me. It mounts to your phone with a spring loaded clamp, I have been able to mount it on my iphone and galaxy s3. Just got it so I don't know about battery life yet.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures in low light. The zoom is fantastic. No Bluetooth that's why no have all stars. Fix in my pocket. Great device.
customer_reviews.author: David Mauricio Olaya Tarquino

customer_reviews.title: Odd but usable
customer_reviews.text: Nice structure, solidly built and durable. IOs apps are not quite there yet, better with NFC coupling from reviews. Good travel companion.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Eventhough it has some quirks it's a great camera with quality shots!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Gulsrud

customer_reviews.title: Crap for documentation
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without any English-language instruction, and without a user manual. Most of the web links to the Sony documents did not work. For those that did work, documentation was Online only - not what I wanted for taking the camera with me on vacation travel. Where PDF was supplied, it was formatted for a large display, totally unsatisfactory for copying to my smart-phone for travel. WAKE UP, SONY - think "usability"!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cal

customer_reviews.title: Qx10
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very Handy. Good Quality. Im enjoying it so far. Very Easy to use. Looking forward to the QX100
customer_reviews.author: Bank Of Guam

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: You have to have your phone on and the lens on in order to take good pictures. If you take a picture just with the lens you won't get it focus right. But if you use it with your phone it works really good.
customer_reviews.author: Tere Melgarejo

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with iphone 6S plus
customer_reviews.text: I did not get credit even though I returned. Did not keep receipt. It did not work with iphone 6S+
customer_reviews.author: Urmikant

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: The time that it takes to set up every time plus the lag time over wifi made it pretty much useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Partensky

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, even if app delay is solved.
customer_reviews.text: This is as impractical as others state in their reviews. The delay in loading the app is a killer. It's not comfortable to carry, despite it's small size and hard to keep the horizon level. You can achieve more with greater proficiency in photo editing apps than with this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: QX10 & QX100 : Cool & i relly like it both
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the QX10 lens with my HTC one , the photos quality are great It's cool that you can put the lens in anywhere to take a photo A great gadget You can watch my photos taken by it on my instagram : abd_alrashdan Update : I also got the QX100 lens , and after using it for 3 days what i can say is AWESOME !! A really nice and cool gadget !!
customer_reviews.author: abdullah a.

customer_reviews.title: ... have is that the app doesn't have film options like sepia tone or washed out
customer_reviews.text: The only negative comment I have is that the app doesn't have film options like sepia tone or washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The imaging sensor is amazing but the lack of software and firmware support by Sony made my purchase a waste of money. The current firmware doesn't allow fast shutter speeds and with that, the software doesn't allow manual controls besides a few things. Don't waste your money, if you're looking for a great camera at a great price, try the Fujifilm FinePix S8500 or S9000 series.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This device is not compatible with both Samsung galaxy S5 & S3.
customer_reviews.author: pietro de lise

customer_reviews.title: Wheres my smartphone clip.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so i got mine today but isn't is suppose to have a clip for the smart phone part? i didnt even get one.. -.-
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Taeyeon

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Revising my review from a 1 star to 3. At first was frustrated due to application freezing and missed shots. This camera is not for action photos! Don't try or you will miss lots of shots and be frustrated. However, it works well for stills and portraits. The ability to remove the lens from the phone allows for some interesting perspectives. Zoom quality over the regular iPhone camera is excellent. App for iOS7 is very poor and would only give it 2 stars. Does still freeze sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-QX10/W Smartphone Attachable 4.45-44.5mm Lens-Style Camera
product_meta.description:
*:White| Style:QX 10| Configuration:BaseIntroducing the first-ever zoom lens and sensor combo that clips right to your smartphone. Now you can get 10x closer to the action with your phone-and share Pictures instantly online for maximum "likes" It’s never been easier or more convenient to capture and share special moments in the beautiful quality they deserve.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 







Introducing the first-ever zoom lens and sensor combo that clips right to your smartphone. Now you can get 10x closer to the action with your phone—and share pics instantly online for maximum “likes.” It’s never been easier or more convenient to capture and share special moments in the beautiful quality
they deserve. 
TECHNOLOGY

ATTACH TO TURN YOUR SMARTPHONE1 INTO A 10X ZOOM CAMERA


Simply attach the compact and lightweight QX10 to turn your smartphone1 into a 10x optical 
zoom camera to capture actions
up close.

NFC/WI-FI® ALLOWS SIMPLE, ONE-TOUCH LINKING TO SMARTPHONES2


The QX10 allows One-touch 
connection with Smartphone via 
Wi-Fi® thanks to NFC. Shoot from your iOS or Android smartphone2 
and record images with the quality 
of dedicated camera device. USE APPS TO EDIT AND SHARE PHOTOS INSTANTLY ONLINE



Millions of Smartphone Apps to 
choose from for editing and sharing 
via text, email and various socials 
like Facebook™ and Instagram™ 
on the fly.

SHOOT AND ENJOY IMAGES THRU THE SMARTPHONE’S LARGE
LCD3 SCREEN
All of the QX10’s features can be accessed via your smartphone’s 
LCD3 screen and the free PlayMemories™ Mobile App. 



UNCOUPLE FROM PHONE AND MOUNT FOR FLEXIBLE SHOOTING

The QX10 can also be used uncoupled from the smartphone. Hold the camera in one hand and your phone in the other, or use the universal tripod screw to mount your camera to any number of mounts to experience versatile, freestyle shooting.

CONVENIENTLY SAVE IMAGES ON BOTH CAMERA & PHONE MEMORY

Images are conveniently saved to 
both camera and smartphone’s memory automatically. With the 
free PlayMemories™ Mobile App 
you’ll then be able to export the images to organize, edit and share anytime, anywhere.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES

iAuto adjusts the camera to the best setting

The QX10 recognizes scene conditions such as low-light, back-lit, macro and more – then automatically adjusts to make sure you always get the shot
you want.

High grade Sony® G Lens with 10x optical zoom

Capture sharp photos with minimal blur even when zoomed in (10x Optical zoom), thanks to Optical SteadyShot™ image stabilization.

Impeccable low light performance

The QX10 sports a back-illuminated 18MP 1/2.3” Exmor R® CMOS sensor producing images with low noise even in low light, far surpassing the quality of images shot on conventional Smartphones.

High-quality 1080/30p HD video with low grain even in low light

Record high quality 1920 x 1080/30p HD video even in low lighting situations. The MP4 format is ideal for enjoying and sharing your HD movies on your Smartphone, PC, Mac® computer or 
the internet.


1. Compatible with virtually all iOS and Android Smartphones. Smartphone case or protective cover may prevent attachment.

2. One-touch connection requires NFC on Smartphone. Smartphones without NFC can connect through Wi-Fi settings

3. Compatible with virtually all iOS and Android Smartphones. Use of Play Memories™ mobile App is required to operate camera from Smartphone.

Microsoft, Windows, and Windows Vista are trademarks of Microsoft Corporation. Mac is a trademark of Apple, Inc. All other trademarks are trademarks of their respective owners. Features and specifications subject to change without notice.
